content: In the automated city of Stenograd, where the Behavioral Compliance Index silently shapes every life, Marek Halden’s sudden death shatters the calm, leaving the Council scrambling as the system falters. Frustrated by official secrecy, Rada Miskovic secretly broadcasts cryptic AI-generated messages of Halden, nudging citizens to uncover the BCI’s buried truths. As these enigmatic broadcasts ripple through the city, alliances form between activists and ordinary people, working together to decode clues and hunt for hidden data. Their relentless search uncovers caches exposing the Council’s manipulation of scores and the dark history of BCI abuses, fueling outrage across Stenograd and igniting widespread calls for true reform and a new, more accountable public assembly.
